========
Examples
========


To see how to utilize WolkConnect library APIs, visit one of the following files and look up detailed information in the Example Usage section:

--------------
Simple Example
--------------
* `Simple example <README_simple.html>`_  - demonstrates the sending of a temperature sensor reading

------------
Full Example
------------
* `Full Example <README_full.html>`_ - demonstrates full WolkAbout IoT Platform potential
